headline: Online Tip
subtitle: Finding your Friends
content: You should be placed straight into any open games containing your Friends automatically - if you find yourself in a game without them, then it may be because they are already on a Job. If you hate being alone and you don’t want to meet new people, you can join your Friends on their Job easily by hitting the Friends tab in the Pause Menu - select an online Friend and hit ‘Join Game’ to join their action.
